Key Match Events: Washington Sundar returned 3/15 in his 4-over spell.
Dion Myers hit a maiden T20I fifty.
Clive Madande notched up his maiden T20I fifty but Zimbabwe fell 24 runs short.
Sanju Samson, Shivam Dube, and Yashasvi Jaiswal were included in the eleven.
Pre-Game Insights: The five-match series is currently poised at 1-1.
Sanju Samson, Shivam Dube, and Yashasvi Jaiswal were included in the eleven following India’s victory parade in Mumbai post the T20 World Cup triumph.
Post-Match Reflections: India’s second consecutive win let them take a 2-1 lead in the series with two more games to go.
The hosts picked up after losing half the batters. The 77-run stand between Madande and Myers was the key highlight.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zimbabwe were sloppy on the field as well. Too many misfields and dropped catches let India score those extra runs which Zimbabwe couldn’t.
The game went into 15 overs before a decisive home run by Dion Myers.
Ravi Bishnoi landed a six off Dine Myers, bringing up his maiden T20I half-century.
